channel.title: Dylan's IT blog
channel.description: Recent content on Dylan's IT blog

item.title: Part 1: Azure DevOps agents with Container apps in bicep
item.description: Requirements In the guide I will use Azure CLI to deploy the bicep templates. A DevOps environment Visual code + Bicep extension will make your life easier. Introduction This is the first part of a series of 2. The first part set-up a Azure DevOps agent within an Azure container registry. In the second part I will use this container to set-up Azure container apps. In my journey to find the best environment for Azure DevOps agents I have found a great solution to get scalable agents.
